0.name: Windrider Bullet
0.fullDesc: Deals Wind DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Bronya's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Combat Redeployment
0.fullDesc: Dispels a <u>debuff</u> from a single ally, allows them to immediately take action, and increases their DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> for {{3}} turn(s).\nWhen this Skill is used on Bronya herself, she cannot immediately take action again.
0.shortDesc: <color=#f29e38ff>Dispels</color> 1 <color=#f29e38ff><u>debuff</u></color> from a single ally, <color=#f29e38ff>increases the damage they deal</color>, and allows them to <color=#f29e38ff>immediately take action</color>.

0.name: The Belobog March
0.fullDesc: Increases the ATK of all allies by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> for {{4}} turn(s).
0.shortDesc: Increases <color=#f29e38ff>ATK</color> and <color=#f29e38ff>CRIT DMG</color> of all allies

0.name: Banner of Command
0.fullDesc: After using Bronya's Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies' ATK increases by {{1}}% for {{2}} turn(s).
0.shortDesc: After this character uses Technique, increases all allies' ATK at the start of the next battle.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
